extension.name: PLG_rs_payment_payflowpro
extension.author: redCOMPONENT.com
extension.description: This plugin enables standard Paypal Pro payments

field.name: refund
field.label: Refund When Cancel or Return Order
field.description: Refund Payment When Cancel or Return Order

field.name: merchant_id
field.label: Merchant Login:
field.description: This is merchant login from paypal

field.name: merchant_password
field.label: Password:
field.description: This is merchant login Password from paypal

field.name: merchant_user
field.label: User:
field.description: If you are using only one user in your Payflow account than keep user same as Merchant Name

field.name: sales_auth_only
field.label: Sale or Authorize Only:
field.description: Do you want to send the final sales info to paypal or just authorize the card and return to the site to be processed later?

field.name: verify_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Order Status for successful transactions
field.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

field.name: invalid_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Order Status for failed transactions
field.description: Select an order status for failed payment transactions.

field.name: capture_status
field.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
field.label: Capture Payment Status
field.description: Select an capture status for capturing payment.

field.name: economic_design_layout
field.label: Enter E-conomic Design and Layout ID
